Since the repeal of #NetNeutrality, ISPs are already throttling streaming speeds, up charging for HD and picking winners and losers. Consumers are left watching the internet slowly change in front of their eyes. It's time to #SaveTheNet.

I’m proud to support the #SaveTheNet Act, a 3 PAGE bill that enacts common-sense #NetNeutrality protections to safeguard free and open Internet. Today, @EnergyCommerce is taking action #ForThePeople to ensure a free and open Internet.

When the @FCC decided to repeal #NetNeutrality, it introduced terrible uncertainty into the market for ISPs, consumers and small businesses alike. Today, my Committee is righting that wrong by moving #SaveTheNet Act, legislation to restore a free and open Internet. pic.twitter.com/lTDbFTIRAK
